bibdata.title: American National Standard Performance Criteria for Hand-held Instruments for the Detection and Identification of Radionuclides
American National Standard Performance Criteria for Hand-held Instruments for the Detection and Identification of Radionuclides

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The performance requirements for hand-held radionuclide identifying instruments are described in this standard. The requirements stated are based on instruments used in support of efforts associated with the U.S. Department of Homeland Security.

The performance requirements for hand-held radionuclide identifying instruments are described in this standard. The requirements stated are based on instruments used in support of efforts associated with the U.S. Department of Homeland Security.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
